biotools.summary: DNAr is a R package developed to design and simulate formal Chemical Reaction Networks (CRN) and DNA-based reaction networks using Strand Displacement reactions. The theoretical field of Chemical Kinetics has developed brightly the last years, being capable of design many circuits and algorithms (such as the Message Passing Inference and a Least mean Squares Estimator) using CRNs as a building block.
